resources.string:
La Torre Antigua is the ideal place to spend an evening full of fun with friends! "
" "
"You will enjoy tasteful mexican specialities and dance until late while drinking lots of sangria and South American beers! "
"
Via Canaletto 16, 41030 Bastiglia (MO) ITALIA "\n" Tel. +39 059 904244 info@latorreantigua.it
